title: iMac 820-3481 a1412
message:
Firstly does anyone have schematics for this model iMac? I can't find anywhere. 
Does anyone know the diagnostic leds mean on this model. I have the bottom one on, the next one up flashs on button push and the rest don't light up. 
Imac does not boot. 
Have gone though board, no liquid damage or burnt out components. 
Cost me $100 dead with a supposedly good LCD so might just strip down and sell anyway. 
Thanks.

title: iMac 820-3481 a1412
message: Probably a short on a rail. Check all coils for shorts.
